LanguageData.ModuleArmorEBF.label: 장갑 모듈
LanguageData.ModuleArmorEBF.description: Extra plating to toughen up a bionic prosthesis. Makes the part harder to destroy, with the side effect of making it heavier, slightly reducing its efficiency. It will increase the health of the part it is installed on and of any connected bionics.
LanguageData.RangedPlatformModule.label: 원거리 플랫폼 모듈e
LanguageData.RangedPlatformModule.description: 팔의 모듈 슬롯에 장착하는 전투 보조 장치. 조준 안정기와 표적 시스템으로 원거리 전투 능력을 크게 향상시킵니다.
LanguageData.MeleePlatformModule.label: 근접 플랫폼 모듈
LanguageData.MeleePlatformModule.description: 팔의 모듈 슬롯에 장착하는 전투 보조 장치. 고감도 모터와 표적 시스템으로 근접 전투 능력을 크게 향상시킵니다.
LanguageData.PowerClaw.label: 강화 발톱 모듈
LanguageData.PowerClaw.description: A combat-oriented hand module that adds hooked claws on each of its fingers. It cuts deep, and it improves strength enough to crush a skull like a hand crushes an egg. The claws can be retracted, to not impede non-combat tasks, however its overall ungainlyness slows down movement slightly.
LanguageData.ModuleEfficiency.label: 고급 연산 모듈
LanguageData.ModuleEfficiency.description: Extra processing power to optimize and boost the performance of a bionic prosthesis. It will improve the efficiency of the part it is installed on and of any connected bionics.
